'''''Amon Hen'' 122''' is the one-hundred-and-twenty-second issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in July [[1993]].

** By: Paul Carter

** By: [[Carl F. Hostetter]]
